data.title: Hostile Witness: Critical Analysis
data.meta_description: hostile witness - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. A hostile witness testifies against the party that called them or provides evidence contrary to their previous statements. Indian law states that just because a witness becomes hostile, their entire statement should not be discarded. Courts have discretion to accept parts of a hostile witness's testimony that are consistent and reject inconsistent parts. Relevant sections of the Indian Evidence Act pertaining to hostile witnesses are discussed.
